identified-content.person: DRUCK, DANIELLE CHAYA MINDEL (DANIELLE CHAYA MINDEL HILBERT)

block.p: Danielle Chaya Mindel Druck, a daughter of Beverly Druck and Dr. Andrew B. Druck of New York, was married on Monday to Paul Avi Hilbert, the son of Sarah and Marc Hilbert of New City, N.Y. Rabbi Aaron Slonim performed the ceremony at the Westmount Country Club in West Paterson, N.J.
The couple graduated from the State University at Binghamton, N.Y., she magna cum laude.

Danielle Chaya Mindel Druck, a daughter of Beverly Druck and Dr. Andrew B. Druck of New York, was married on Monday to Paul Avi Hilbert, the son of Sarah and Marc Hilbert of New City, N.Y. Rabbi Aaron Slonim performed the ceremony at the Westmount Country Club in West Paterson, N.J.
The couple graduated from the State University at Binghamton, N.Y., she magna cum laude.

The bride, 22, is an assistant cosmetics buyer in New York for Lord & Taylor. Her father is a clinical psychologist and psychoanalyst in New York and the president of the Institute for Psychoanalytic Training and Research in New York. Her mother is a social worker with a private counseling and therapy practice in New York.

The bridegroom, 21, is a project manager at Teleplan Associates, a telecommunications consulting company in Poughkeepsie, N.Y., that is owned by his father. The bridegroom's mother is a real estate agent at Tap'n See Realty in New City and the president of the Moledet chapter of Hadassah.
